mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Poor Mountain iron lands: 2,975 acres, Roanoke Co., Va
Map of Poor Mountain iron lands, Roanoke County, Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gifford, J. B. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ancillary maps: Map showing relation of Poor Mountain iron lands to railways, coking coal, etc. (scale 24 miles to one inch with radial distances shown at 25 mile intervals) -- [Cross section through Flat Top Mountain from forks of Elkhorn River to Pocahontas] -- Geological section from mouth of Dry Run to Spur of Poor Mn. [original]
Possibly created in conjunction with the survey conducted by J.B. Gifford in 1883. -- Cf. The Virginias, v. 5 (1884), p. 44. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Lower right corner cut away. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Iron ores--Virginia--Roanoke County--Maps, Manuscript
Mines and mineral resources--Virginia--Roanoke County--Maps, Manuscript
Roanoke County (Va.)--Maps, Manuscript
